title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practice Competency: Development of Online Project-Based Mathematics Education Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (functions, calculus, statistics)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Complete three or more projects solving real-life problems through mathematical modeling

Learners can complete a data analysis project including three+ data visualization outputs (e.g., dashboards, charts) using online collaboration tools like Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs) and Notion with team members within a six-month course.
Achieve over 80% competency in concept application through weekly formative assessments
Submit five or more numerical analysis assignments using programming tools (Python/R)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
